description.brazilian: Conclua seu primeiro pedido de lavanderia. Negócios iniciados!
description.english: Complete your very first laundry order.
description.french: Termine ta toute première commande de lessive. C’est parti !
description.german: Deinen allerersten Waschauftrag abgeschlossen – der Laden läuft!
description.indonesian: Selesaikan pesanan laundry pertamamu. Awal yang bersih!
description.japanese: 人生初の洗濯注文を完了！お店、開業！
description.koreana: 인생 첫 세탁 주문 완료! 세탁 인생 시작~
description.polish: Zrealizuj swoje pierwsze zlecenie prania. Czysty start!
description.russian: Выполни первый заказ на стирку. Прачка официально открыта!
description.schinese: 完成你的第一份洗衣订单，正式营业啦！
description.spanish: Completa tu primer pedido de lavandería. ¡Empieza el negocio!
description.swedish: Slutför din allra första tvättbeställning. Nu börjar det!
description.tchinese: 完成你的第一筆洗衣訂單，正式開張啦！
description.turkish: İlk çamaşır siparişini tamamla. Macera başlasın!

description.brazilian: Conclua 10 pedidos. A clientela está crescendo.
description.english: Finish 10 laundry orders. Business is picking up.
description.french: 10 lessives terminées. L’affaire commence à tourner.
description.german: 10 Waschaufträge erledigt. Es kommt Schwung in die Bude.
description.indonesian: Selesaikan 10 pesanan. Bisnis mulai jalan!
description.japanese: 洗濯注文を10件完了。商売が軌道に乗ってきた。
description.koreana: 세탁 주문 10건 완료! 장사 감 잡았다!
description.polish: Ukończ 10 zleceń. Interes się kręci.
description.russian: Выполни 10 заказов. Работа пошла!
description.schinese: 完成 10 份洗衣订单，生意开始有点样子了。
description.spanish: Termina 10 pedidos. El negocio empieza a florecer.
description.swedish: Avsluta 10 tvättbeställningar. Verksamheten börjar ta fart.
description.tchinese: 完成 10 筆洗衣訂單，生意有點起色了。
description.turkish: 10 siparişi tamamla. İşler açılmaya başladı.

description.brazilian: Conclua 100 pedidos. Todo mundo está falando de você!
description.english: Complete 100 customer laundry orders.
description.french: 100 commandes client terminées. Tu deviens une légende locale.
description.german: 100 Kundenaufträge geschafft – dein Ruf eilt dir voraus.
description.indonesian: Selesaikan 100 pesanan pelanggan. Kamu mulai jadi pembicaraan!
description.japanese: 顧客100人分の洗濯を完了。地域で話題の職人に！
description.koreana: 100명의 고객 주문 완료. 세탁소 입소문 나기 시작!
description.polish: Ukończ 100 zleceń pralniczych. Jesteś już rozpoznawalny!
description.russian: 100 заказов выполнено. Ты — местная легенда.
description.schinese: 累计完成 100 单，熟练得像专业洗衣工。
description.spanish: Completa 100 pedidos. ¡Ya eres conocido en el barrio!
description.swedish: Slutför 100 kundorder. Ditt rykte sprider sig i kvarteret!
description.tchinese: 完成 100 筆洗衣訂單，專業度爆表！
description.turkish: 100 müşteri siparişini tamamla. Mahalle seni konuşuyor!

description.brazilian: 500 lavagens! A centrífuga nunca para.
description.english: Wash 500 loads. The spin cycle never stops.
description.french: 500 lessives réalisées. Le tambour tourne sans fin !
description.german: 500 Ladungen gewaschen. Der Schleudergang kennt kein Ende.
description.indonesian: Cuci 500 muatan. Mesinmu kerja terus tanpa henti!
description.japanese: 500回洗濯！脱水機もフル稼働。
description.koreana: 세탁 500회 달성. 탈수기도 고장날 틈이 없다!
description.polish: 500 ładunków prania. Wirówka nie ma przerwy!
description.russian: 500 загрузок — барабан крутится, а ты — не устаёшь!
description.schinese: 洗了 500 次衣服，甩干机都快冒烟了。
description.spanish: Lava 500 cargas. ¡Tu lavadora no descansa!
description.swedish: Tvätta 500 laddningar. Centrifugen går varm!
description.tchinese: 洗了 500 次衣物，脫水機都快冒煙了。
description.turkish: 500 çamaşır yıka. Makine senden yoruldu!

description.brazilian: Você é uma lenda local da limpeza.
description.english: You're now a local laundry legend.
description.french: Tu es désormais le roi de la buanderie du quartier.
description.german: Du bist jetzt eine lokale Waschkönig:in.
description.indonesian: Kamu sekarang legenda laundry lokal.
description.japanese: あなたの名はこの街で知らない人がいない。
description.koreana: 이제 당신은 동네 전설급 세탁 장인.
description.polish: Jesteś lokalną legendą czystości.
description.russian: Ты — икона района. Все знают, кому доверить бельё.
description.schinese: 你已成为本地洗衣圈的传说人物。
description.spanish: Eres toda una leyenda local.
description.swedish: Nu är du en lokal tvättlegend.
description.tchinese: 你成為街坊洗衣圈的傳奇人物。
description.turkish: Artık yerel bir efsanesin.

description.brazilian: Você segue firme, e as máquinas também!
description.english: Still going strong — the machines are humming.
description.french: Les machines tournent, et toi aussi – toujours plus fort.
description.german: Immer noch am Start – deine Maschinen summen im Takt.
description.indonesian: Kamu masih kuat, mesin juga masih berdengung.
description.japanese: まだまだ現役！洗濯機も歌い出す。
description.koreana: 아직도 굴러간다! 기계도 사람도 멈추지 않아!
description.polish: Wciąż działasz, maszyny też!
description.russian: Ты всё ещё тут. И стиралка всё ещё жива.
description.schinese: 机器轰鸣不停，你依旧稳如老狗。
description.spanish: Las máquinas zumban y tú sigues a tope.
description.swedish: Maskinerna brummar, du fortsätter köra på.
description.tchinese: 機器轉不停，你依舊神清氣爽。
description.turkish: Hâlâ güçlüsün, makineler hâlâ çalışıyor!

description.brazilian: Até suas máquinas merecem um prêmio.
description.english: At this point, your washers deserve a medal too.
description.french: Tes machines méritent une médaille, elles aussi.
description.german: Deine Waschmaschinen hätten sich auch ein Denkmal verdient.
description.indonesian: Mesinmu pantas diberi medali juga!
description.japanese: 洗濯機にも表彰状を贈ろう。
description.koreana: 이쯤 되면 세탁기도 상 받아야 한다.
description.polish: Twoje pralki zasługują na medal.
description.russian: Машинка заслужила отпуск. А ты — медаль.
description.schinese: 你的洗衣机也配得上一个奖杯。
description.spanish: ¡Tus lavadoras merecen una medalla también!
description.swedish: Dina tvättmaskiner förtjänar också ett pris.
description.tchinese: 洗衣機都該頒獎給你了。
description.turkish: Bu noktada makineler de madalya hak etti.

description.brazilian: 10.000 pedidos. Imbatível!
description.english: 10,000 laundry orders — you're unstoppable.
description.french: 10 000 commandes. Rien ne peut t’arrêter.
description.german: 10.000 Waschaufträge – du bist nicht mehr aufzuhalten.
description.indonesian: 10.000 pesanan laundry — kamu benar-benar tak terhentikan.
description.japanese: 10000回洗濯達成。あなたは止まらない！
description.koreana: 세탁 주문 10,000건 완료! 당신은 세탁 기계보다 빠르다.
description.polish: 10 000 zleceń – jesteś nie do zatrzymania!
description.russian: 10 000 заказов. Ты — неудержим.
description.schinese: 完成 10,000 单洗衣任务，毫无怨言。
description.spanish: 10.000 pedidos de lavandería. ¡Eres imparable!
description.swedish: 10 000 tvättorder – du är ostoppbar!
description.tchinese: 洗滿 10,000 單，根本停不下來！
description.turkish: 10.000 siparişi tamamla – artık durdurulamazsın.

description.brazilian: 20.000 lavagens feitas. Isso virou um império!
description.english: 20,000 orders. This is no laundromat — it's an empire.
description.french: 20 000 commandes ! Ce n’est plus une laverie, c’est un empire.
description.german: 20.000 Aufträge. Das ist kein Waschsalon mehr – das ist ein Imperium.
description.indonesian: 20.000 order. Ini bukan sekadar laundry, ini kerajaan!
description.japanese: 20000件の注文達成。これはもはや洗濯帝国！
description.koreana: 20,000건 돌파. 이건 세탁소가 아니라 제국이다.
description.polish: 20 000 zamówień. To już nie pralnia – to imperium!
description.russian: 20 000 заказов — ты управляешь империей, не просто прачечной.
description.schinese: 20,000 单洗衣订单？你经营的是洗衣王国！
description.spanish: 20.000 pedidos. Esto no es una lavandería, ¡es un imperio!
description.swedish: 20 000 order. Det här är inget tvätteri längre – det är ett imperium!
description.tchinese: 20,000 單達成，你這不是店，是帝國。
description.turkish: 20.000 sipariş. Bu bir çamaşırhane değil, imparatorluk!

description.brazilian: Realize sua primeira venda. Ca-ching!
description.english: Handle your first customer purchase.
description.french: Effectue ton tout premier passage en caisse client.
description.german: Deinen ersten Einkauf abgewickelt – klingeling!
description.indonesian: Layani pembelian pertama dari pelanggan. Ka-ching!
description.japanese: 初めてのお会計を処理。レジ音が心地いい。
description.koreana: 고객 첫 결제 처리 완료! '띠링~' 소리가 들린다.
description.polish: Zrealizuj swoją pierwszą sprzedaż klientowi.
description.russian: Оформи первую покупку клиента. Деньги пошли!
description.schinese: 完成第一次顾客结账。感觉自己像个老板了吧？
description.spanish: Procesa tu primera compra de cliente. ¡Ka-ching!
description.swedish: Hantera din första kundbetalning. Kaching!
description.tchinese: 完成你的第一筆顧客購物結帳。
description.turkish: İlk müşteri alışverişini tamamla. Kasadan ‘çın’ sesi geldi!

description.brazilian: Finalize compras para 10 clientes. Caixa em ação!
description.english: Complete checkout for 10 shopping customers.
description.french: Finalise les achats de 10 clients. La caisse n’a plus de secret pour toi.
description.german: 10 Kunden erfolgreich an der Kasse abgefertigt.
description.indonesian: Proses pembelian untuk 10 pelanggan. Kasir makin lincah!
description.japanese: 買い物客10人を無事に会計完了！
description.koreana: 10명의 쇼핑 고객을 결제 완료. 슬슬 손에 익는다!
description.polish: Zakończ zakupy 10 klientów. Obsługa opanowana.
description.russian: Обслужи 10 покупателей. Всё только начинается.
description.schinese: 为 10 位顾客结账，小试牛刀。
description.spanish: Finaliza la compra para 10 clientes. ¡Pim pam!
description.swedish: Slutför köpet för 10 kunder. Kassaexperten är här.
description.tchinese: 替 10 位顧客完成購物結帳。
description.turkish: 10 alışverişi tamamla. Kasa artık sana yabancı değil.

description.brazilian: Realize 100 transações. Você está rápido nisso!
description.english: Ring up 100 transactions — you're getting good at this.
description.french: Effectue 100 transactions – la vitesse est ton alliée.
description.german: 100 Verkäufe abgeschlossen – die Kasse wird dein bester Freund.
description.indonesian: Selesaikan 100 transaksi — kamu makin ahli!
description.japanese: 100件の取引処理。指が覚えてる。
description.koreana: 100건 결제 완료. 손이 따로 논다!
description.polish: Zrealizuj 100 transakcji. Coraz szybciej!
description.russian: 100 покупок оформлено. Навыки растут!
description.schinese: 完成 100 笔交易，收银台都快被你磨平了。
description.spanish: 100 transacciones completadas. ¡Ya dominas la caja!
description.swedish: 100 transaktioner genomförda. Fingrarna dansar!
description.tchinese: 完成 100 筆交易，手感逐漸起來了。
description.turkish: 100 işlem tamamla. Parmakların otomatikleşti!

description.brazilian: 500 clientes em um dia. Linha sempre andando!
description.english: You've checked out 500 customers. Keep the line moving!
description.french: 500 clients encaissés. Tu peux poser une chaise derrière la caisse.
description.german: 500 Kunden abgefertigt. Und kein Ende in Sicht!
description.indonesian: 500 pelanggan dilayani. Antrian terus jalan!
description.japanese: 500人分の会計を完了。お昼食べる暇もない！
description.koreana: 500명의 손님 결제 완료. 점심도 못 먹었잖아?
description.polish: Obsłuż 500 klientów. Kolejka nie ma końca!
description.russian: Совершите 500 кассовых операций, клиенты будут подходить один за другим!
description.schinese: 完成 500 笔结帐，客人一波接一波！
description.spanish: 500 clientes atendidos. ¡A toda máquina!
description.swedish: Betjäna 500 kunder. Inga pauser idag!
description.tchinese: 完成 500 筆結帳，客人一波接一波！
description.turkish: 500 müşteriyi başarıyla kasadan geçir. Çalış çalış!

description.brazilian: 1.000 atendimentos feitos. Você faz isso de olhos fechados.
description.english: 1,000 customers served — your fingers know the register by heart.
description.french: 1 000 clients servis – tes doigts tapent tout seuls.
description.german: 1.000 Kunden bedient – deine Finger tippen im Autopilot.
description.indonesian: 1.000 pelanggan dilayani — tanganmu tahu tombol tanpa lihat!
description.japanese: 1000人分のお会計を処理。あなたの手はレジ職人。
description.koreana: 1,000건 완료. 계산기 안 봐도 손이 기억해!
description.polish: 1000 transakcji. Twoje palce znają klawiaturę na pamięć.
description.russian: 1000 покупок оформлено. Касса стала продолжением твоей руки.
description.schinese: 1,000 单结账后，眼睛不用看，手都记住键位了。
description.spanish: 1.000 clientes. Tus dedos escriben solos.
description.swedish: 1 000 kunder betjänade – du och kassan är ett.
description.tchinese: 完成 1,000 筆交易，收銀機你能盲操作。
description.turkish: 1.000 müşteri işlemi. Gözün kapalı kasa alırsın artık.

description.brazilian: 5.000 compras registradas. Você manda no comércio!
description.english: 5,000 purchases handled. Business is booming.
description.french: 5 000 achats traités. Les affaires roulent.
description.german: 5.000 Einkäufe gemeistert. Es läuft wie geschmiert.
description.indonesian: 5.000 pembelian ditangani. Bisnis sedang booming!
description.japanese: 5000件のお買い物処理。これはもう戦場。
description.koreana: 5,000건 결제 완료. 이제 체력전이다.
description.polish: Obsłuż 5000 zakupów. Prawdziwy weteran sprzedaży.
description.russian: 5000 продаж. Настоящий герой торгового фронта.
description.schinese: 处理 5,000 笔交易，收银生涯迈入战斗阶段。
description.spanish: 5.000 compras gestionadas. ¡Esto va en serio!
description.swedish: 5 000 köp hanterade. Dags att andas?
description.tchinese: 處理 5,000 筆交易，銷售如火如荼。
description.turkish: 5.000 alışveriş tamamlandı. Gerçekten yoğunsun!

description.brazilian: 10.000 caixas. Agora é varejo pesado!
description.english: 10,000 checkouts complete — now that’s volume.
description.french: 10 000 passages en caisse – c’est de l’artillerie lourde.
description.german: 10.000 Transaktionen. Das ist Massenabfertigung vom Feinsten.
description.indonesian: 10.000 checkout selesai — volume gila!
description.japanese: 10000人の買い物客を対応。すごすぎる。
description.koreana: 10,000건 완료! 줄 선 사람들 어쩔~
description.polish: 10 000 kas zakończonych. Ruch jak w centrum handlowym!
description.russian: 10 000 покупателей. Очереди — это твоё.
description.schinese: 10,000 次结账，连顾客都佩服你手速。
description.spanish: 10.000 pagos procesados. ¡Ritmo frenético!
description.swedish: 10 000 utcheckningar klara. Högtryck!
description.tchinese: 完成 10,000 次結帳，顧客都快走不動了。
description.turkish: 10.000 işlem. Müşteriler sıraya girdi bile!

description.brazilian: 20.000 clientes. Sua loja é a mais bombada da cidade!
description.english: 20,000 customers? You're running the busiest shop in town.
description.french: 20 000 clients ? Ton magasin est la star de la ville.
description.german: 20.000 Kunden? Dein Laden ist Stadtgespräch Nr. 1.
description.indonesian: 20.000 pelanggan? Toko kamu jadi paling sibuk se-kota!
description.japanese: 20000人の顧客を対応。あなたの店、繁盛中！
description.koreana: 20,000명 응대 완료. 당신 가게는 전국구다.
description.polish: 20 000 klientów. Najbardziej oblegany sklep w mieście!
description.russian: 20 000 клиентов. Это самый популярный магазин в округе!
description.schinese: 服务 20,000 位顾客，你店的热度破表了。
description.spanish: 20.000 clientes. Eres la tienda más concurrida del barrio.
description.swedish: 20 000 kunder. Din butik är en snackis i stan.
description.tchinese: 服務 20,000 位顧客，你是鎮上最忙的店長！
description.turkish: 20.000 müşteri. Şehrin en popüler dükkânı artık senin!

description.brazilian: Chegue à velocidade máxima. Correndo como nunca!
description.english: Reach max level in movement speed.
description.french: Atteins la vitesse de déplacement maximale. Tu voles presque.
description.german: Maximales Bewegungstempo erreicht – wo ist der Turbo-Knopf?
description.indonesian: Capai level maksimum kecepatan gerak. Kayak kilat!
description.japanese: 移動速度最大に到達。風より速い！
description.koreana: 이동 속도 최대치 달성. 날개 단 발걸음!
description.polish: Osiągnij maksymalną prędkość ruchu. Jesteś rakietą!
description.russian: Достигни максимальной скорости передвижения. Летаешь!
description.schinese: 将移动速度升至满级，跑得比顾客还快。
description.spanish: Alcanza la velocidad máxima de movimiento. ¡Vuela!
description.swedish: Nå maxnivån i rörelsehastighet. Du flyger fram!
description.tchinese: 移動速度達到最高等級，快到起飛！
description.turkish: Maksimum hareket hızına ulaş. Ayakların yerden kesiliyor!

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os espaços da mochila.
description.english: Unlock all backpack slots.
description.french: Débloque tous les emplacements du sac à dos. T’es prêt pour un déménagement.
description.german: Alle Rucksackslots freigeschaltet. Platzprobleme? Nie gehört.
description.indonesian: Buka semua slot ransel. Siap angkut segalanya!
description.japanese: バックパックスロットをすべて解放。どんとこい荷物！
description.koreana: 백팩 슬롯 전부 해제. 이제 뭐든 담자!
description.polish: Odblokuj wszystkie sloty plecaka. Pomieścisz wszystko!
description.russian: Открой все слоты рюкзака. Теперь влезет всё!
description.schinese: 解锁全部背包格子，想装啥都能塞进去。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las ranuras del inventario. ¡Llévalo todo!
description.swedish: Lås upp alla ryggsäcksplatser. Mer plats, mer kraft!
description.tchinese: 背包格全開，收納王者就是你。
description.turkish: Tüm sırt çantası yuvalarını aç. Artık her şeyi taşıyabilirsin.

description.brazilian: Domine a habilidade de conserto. Nada fica quebrado por muito tempo.
description.english: Max out your repair skills — nothing stays broken long.
description.french: Compétence de réparation au max – les pannes te fuient.
description.german: Reparatur-Skill auf Max – was kaputt ist, bleibt nicht lang so.
description.indonesian: Naikkan skill servis ke level maksimum. Rusak? Bukan masalah!
description.japanese: 修理スキルMAX。壊れ物？瞬時に直せる。
description.koreana: 수리 스킬 만렙. 고장난 기계도 당신 앞에선 복종.
description.polish: Zmaksymalizuj umiejętność naprawy. Nic się długo nie psuje!
description.russian: Максимальный навык ремонта. Поломки — не твой уровень.
description.schinese: 维修技能拉满，破的你一碰就灵。
description.spanish: Máximo nivel de reparación. ¡Nada se queda roto!
description.swedish: Maxa din reparationsförmåga – inget är trasigt länge!
description.tchinese: 修理技能滿級，東西壞不了三秒。
description.turkish: Tamir yeteneğini son seviyeye çıkar. Bozulan kalmaz!

description.brazilian: Venda lixo por preço de ouro. Reciclagem é luxo!
description.english: Sell junk for top dollar with max recycle skill.
description.french: Vends des déchets à prix d’or. T’es un génie écologique.
description.german: Schrott zu Geld gemacht – mit Stil und Skill.
description.indonesian: Jual barang bekas dengan harga tinggi. Uang dari sampah!
description.japanese: ゴミも金になる！究極のリサイクラー。
description.koreana: 쓰레기로도 부자가 된다! 재활용의 신.
description.polish: Sprzedawaj śmieci za grubą kasę. Biznes to biznes!
description.russian: Продавай хлам за большие деньги. Утилизация — это бизнес!
description.schinese: 垃圾也能卖高价，你是环保圈的生意精。
description.spanish: Vende chatarra a precio de oro. ¡Reciclar da dinero!
description.swedish: Sälj skräp till högt pris. Miljövänligt och lönsamt!
description.tchinese: 靠垃圾翻身，你才是真正的環保財神。
description.turkish: Çöpleri paraya çevir. Hem çevreci hem kârlı!

description.brazilian: Popularidade máxima! Todo mundo conhece você.
description.english: Max out your popularity — everyone knows your name.
description.french: Popularité maximale – tout le quartier connaît ton prénom.
description.german: Beliebtheit am Anschlag – jeder kennt dich beim Namen.
description.indonesian: Popularitas maksimal — semua orang kenal kamu!
description.japanese: 人気度MAX。誰もがあなたを知っている！
description.koreana: 인기도 MAX! 길가다 인사받는 수준.
description.polish: Maksymalna popularność – znają Cię wszyscy!
description.russian: Максимум популярности. Все тебя знают, даже почтальон.
description.schinese: 人气值满级，走到哪都有人打招呼。
description.spanish: Popularidad al máximo. ¡Todos te saludan!
description.swedish: Maxa din popularitet – alla vet vem du är!
description.tchinese: 人氣值滿點，連貓狗都認識你。
description.turkish: Popülerliğin tavan yaptı. Herkes seni tanıyor!

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as habilidades do jogo. Show!
description.english: Unlock every skill available in the game.
description.french: Débloque toutes les compétences du jeu. Multi-talent confirmé.
description.german: Alle Skills freigeschaltet. Multitalent auf dem Vormarsch!
description.indonesian: Buka semua skill yang ada. Serba bisa!
description.japanese: 全スキル解放完了。多才すぎる！
description.koreana: 모든 스킬 해금. 이제 못하는 게 없다!
description.polish: Odblokuj wszystkie umiejętności w grze. Jesteś kompletny!
description.russian: Открой все навыки. Больше нечего учить!
description.schinese: 解锁所有技能，已经内卷到极致。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las habilidades del juego. ¡Eres el mejor!
description.swedish: Lås upp alla färdigheter i spelet. Du kan allt!
description.tchinese: 解鎖遊戲內所有技能，職業技能滿滿滿。
description.turkish: Oyundaki tüm yetenekleri aç. Gerçek bir usta!

description.brazilian: Receba 20 visitantes num só dia. A coisa começou!
description.english: Have 20 visitors in one day.
description.french: Avoir 20 visiteurs en une journée. Ça sent la tendance.
description.german: 20 Besucher an einem Tag. Läuft bei dir!
description.indonesian: Dapatkan 20 pengunjung dalam sehari. Toko mulai dilirik!
description.japanese: 1日に20人来店。いいスタート！
description.koreana: 하루 방문객 20명 돌파. 입소문 시작이다!
description.polish: Przyjmij 20 odwiedzających w ciągu jednego dnia.
description.russian: Прими 20 посетителей за день. Начало положено!
description.schinese: 一天迎来 20 位顾客，小店初现人气。
description.spanish: 20 visitantes en un día. ¡Esto promete!
description.swedish: Få 20 besökare på en dag. Det är på gång!
description.tchinese: 一天內迎來 20 位顧客，小有名氣啦。
description.turkish: Bir günde 20 ziyaretçiye ulaş. Başlangıç güzel!

description.brazilian: 50 visitantes num dia. A notícia se espalhou.
description.english: Hit 50 daily visitors — the word is spreading.
description.french: 50 visiteurs en une journée. Ton nom circule dans la rue.
description.german: 50 Besucher an einem Tag. Die Leute reden über dich.
description.indonesian: 50 pengunjung per hari — makin banyak yang tahu!
description.japanese: 1日50人来店。口コミ効果抜群！
description.koreana: 하루 방문자 50명 달성. 여기 핫플이야?
description.polish: 50 odwiedzających dziennie – wieść się niesie!
description.russian: 50 посетителей в день. Люди идут по сарафану.
description.schinese: 单日 50 人上门，邻里传遍你的好口碑。
description.spanish: 50 visitantes diarios. ¡La fama se expande!
description.swedish: Få 50 besökare på en dag. Ryktet sprider sig.
description.tchinese: 單日來客數達 50，大家都來湊熱鬧了。
description.turkish: Bir günde 50 ziyaretçiye ulaş. Hakkında konuşuluyor!

description.brazilian: 100 pessoas em um dia. Você tá bombando!
description.english: 100 people in one day? You're doing something right.
description.french: 100 clients en une journée ? La sueur devient rentable.
description.german: 100 Kunden an einem Tag? Du machst wohl was richtig.
description.indonesian: 100 pelanggan dalam sehari? Mantap betul!
description.japanese: 1日100人来店。てんやわんや！
description.koreana: 100명 하루 방문. 잘 나가네~
description.polish: 100 klientów w ciągu dnia? Coś robisz dobrze!
description.russian: 100 клиентов за день. Кто-то явно хорошо рекламирует!
description.schinese: 100 人在一天内光顾，招架得住才是本事。
description.spanish: 100 personas en un día. ¡Algo estás haciendo bien!
description.swedish: 100 kunder på en dag – något gör du rätt!
description.tchinese: 100 人進門，忙得連水都喝不到。
description.turkish: Bir günde 100 kişi ağırladın. Yüklenmeye devam!

description.brazilian: Atenda 200 clientes num único dia. Caos positivo!
description.english: Serve 200 customers in a single day — nonstop action!
description.french: 200 clients en un jour – c’est de l’action non-stop !
description.german: 200 Kunden an einem Tag – du brauchst ein größeres Wartezimmer!
description.indonesian: Layani 200 pelanggan dalam satu hari — non stop!
description.japanese: 200人来店の大混雑。お客さまラッシュ！
description.koreana: 하루에 200명 응대. 정말 쉬지 않는다!
description.polish: 200 klientów dziennie. To się nazywa ruch!
description.russian: 200 покупателей за день. Это уже безумие.
description.schinese: 单日服务 200 位顾客，根本停不下来。
description.spanish: 200 clientes en un solo día. ¡Puro caos!
description.swedish: 200 kunder under en dag. Håll i dig!
description.tchinese: 一天接待 200 位顧客，人氣爆棚！
description.turkish: Bir günde 200 müşteri. Sürekli hareket!

description.brazilian: 300 visitantes num dia. A estrela é você!
description.english: 300 visitors in a day — this is peak performance.
description.french: 300 visiteurs en une journée. Tu es LA destination.
description.german: 300 Besucher an einem Tag. Die Bude brummt!
description.indonesian: 300 pengunjung sehari — ini puncaknya!
description.japanese: 1日300人来店。あなたが目玉！
description.koreana: 하루 300명 방문. 전국구 가게 인증.
description.polish: 300 wizyt w ciągu jednego dnia. Absolutny rekord!
description.russian: 300 клиентов в день. Рекорды падают!
description.schinese: 单日 300 人上门，这才叫流量巅峰！
description.spanish: 300 visitas en un día. ¡Eres el centro de atención!
description.swedish: 300 kunder på en dag. Full rulle!
description.tchinese: 單日吸引 300 人，這就是巔峰時刻。
description.turkish: Bir günde 300 ziyaretçi. Bu iş tam senlik!

description.brazilian: Ganhe 10.000 em receita. Agora vai!
description.english: Earn a total of 10,000 in revenue.
description.french: Atteins 10 000 en revenus. Le début de la fortune.
description.german: Insgesamt 10.000 Umsatz gemacht – das war nur der Anfang.
description.indonesian: Raih total penghasilan Rp10.000. Langkah awal yang bagus!
description.japanese: 累計収益1万到達。スタートとしては完璧！
description.koreana: 수익 총 10,000 달성. 시작이 반이다!
description.polish: Zarób 10 000. Pierwszy krok do fortuny!
description.russian: Заработай 10,000. Деньги потекли рекой!
description.schinese: 累计赚得 10,000 元，第一桶金入袋。
description.spanish: Consigue 10.000 en ingresos totales. ¡Bien jugado!
description.swedish: Tjäna totalt 10 000. Nu pratar vi pengar.
description.tchinese: 總收入達 10,000 元，發財第一步。
description.turkish: Toplamda 10.000 kazandın. Güzel başlangıç!

description.brazilian: Ganhe 100.000. Impressionante!
description.english: Reach 100,000 in lifetime earnings.
description.french: Gagne 100 000 au total. Pas mal du tout.
description.german: 100.000 verdient – ganz ohne Lotterie.
description.indonesian: Raih total penghasilan Rp100.000. Lumayan banget!
description.japanese: 収益10万突破。稼ぎ方を心得ている！
description.koreana: 누적 수익 100,000 달성. 돈 맛 좀 보네?
description.polish: Zgromadź 100 000 przychodu. Robi wrażenie!
description.russian: Заработай 100,000. Впечатляет!
description.schinese: 收入突破 100,000，成了本地有头有脸的老板。
description.spanish: Alcanza 100.000 en ganancias. ¡Vas con todo!
description.swedish: Nå 100 000 i intäkter. Stort kliv!
description.tchinese: 累積收入突破 100,000，財路初成。
description.turkish: Toplamda 100.000 gelir elde et. Zenginlik yolu başladı.

description.brazilian: Mais de 500.000 ganhos. Você é profissional!
description.english: You've earned over 500,000. Impressive!
description.french: Plus de 500 000 gagnés. Le sérieux commence.
description.german: Über 500.000 verdient. Beeindruckend!
description.indonesian: Pendapatan melewati Rp500.000. Kamu serius banget nih!
description.japanese: 50万以上の収益。立派な実業家だ！
description.koreana: 총 수익 500,000 돌파. 당신은 진짜 사장님!
description.polish: Zarobione 500 000. Biznesmen z prawdziwego zdarzenia.
description.russian: Доход более 500,000. Почти на яхту хватит!
description.schinese: 收入累计超 500,000，实力不容小觑。
description.spanish: Supera los 500.000 en ingresos. ¡Eres un empresario serio!
description.swedish: Tjäna över 500 000. Du är på väg uppåt!
description.tchinese: 賺超過 500,000，你已是實力老闆。
description.turkish: 500.000 geliri geçtin. Bravo patron!

description.brazilian: 1 milhão em renda. Agora é só descansar (ou expandir)!
description.english: Hit a million in total income — you're officially rich.
description.french: 1 million de revenus cumulés – tu n’as plus besoin de pièces !
description.german: Eine Million Umsatz. Zeit für den goldenen Waschkorb!
description.indonesian: Capai Rp1.000.000 pendapatan. Sah jadi orang kaya!
description.japanese: 100万収益達成。もうお金に困らない？
description.koreana: 누적 수익 1,000,000. 이제 슈퍼카 뽑아도 돼요!
description.polish: Zarób 1 000 000 – oficjalnie jesteś bogaty!
description.russian: 1,000,000 дохода. Деньги любят чистоту!
description.schinese: 赚得超过 1,000,000，是时候考虑投资地产了。
description.spanish: Gana 1.000.000. ¡Ahora eres oficialmente rico!
description.swedish: Nå 1 000 000 i intäkter – rena pengar!
description.tchinese: 總收入破百萬，是時候考慮拓店了！
description.turkish: 1.000.000 kazandın. Artık zenginsin, resmî olarak.

description.brazilian: Ganhe 10 milhões. O império da limpeza prospera!
description.english: Earn 10 million overall — the laundry empire thrives!
description.french: Gagne 10 millions. Ton empire du propre s’impose !
description.german: 10 Millionen verdient – das Waschimperium lebt!
description.indonesian: Raih Rp10 juta total. Kerajaan laundrymu berjaya!
description.japanese: 収益1000万達成。洗濯帝国完成！
description.koreana: 1,000만 수익 달성. 세탁 왕국 설립 완료!
description.polish: Zarób 10 milionów – Twoje imperium kwitnie!
description.russian: Заработай 10 миллионов. Империя стирает и растёт!
description.schinese: 收入破千万，洗衣帝国实至名归！
description.spanish: Consigue 10 millones. ¡El imperio de lavandería triunfa!
description.swedish: Tjäna 10 miljoner totalt – imperiet växer!
description.tchinese: 總收入達 1,000 萬，洗衣帝國名副其實！
description.turkish: 10 milyon kazan. Çamaşır imparatorluğu büyüyor!

description.brazilian: Ganhe sua primeira gorjeta. Alguém te ama!
description.english: Receive your first tip — someone appreciates your service.
description.french: Reçois ton tout premier pourboire. Le client est ravi.
description.german: Dein erstes Trinkgeld bekommen – das nennt man Kundenbindung.
description.indonesian: Terima tip pertamamu. Pelanggan puas banget!
description.japanese: 初めてのチップ。お客様感謝感激。
description.koreana: 첫 팁 수령! 서비스 인정받았다!
description.polish: Otrzymaj swój pierwszy napiwek. Klient zadowolony!
description.russian: Получи первые чаевые. Клиенты в восторге!
description.schinese: 第一次收到小费，有人感动到掏钱了！
description.spanish: Recibe tu primera propina. ¡Cliente feliz!
description.swedish: Få din första dricks. Någon uppskattar dig!
description.tchinese: 第一次收到小費，服務感動人心！
description.turkish: İlk bahşişini al. Müşteri seni sevmiş!

description.brazilian: Conserte seu primeiro equipamento. Vai virar hábito!
description.english: Fix your first piece of equipment.
description.french: Répare ton premier appareil. Et hop, un outil dans la main.
description.german: Dein erstes Gerät repariert. Werkzeuggott in Ausbildung.
description.indonesian: Perbaiki peralatan pertama. Kamu orang serbabisa!
description.japanese: 初めて設備を修理。これで一人前！
description.koreana: 첫 기계 수리 완료. 이제 공구가 친구다!
description.polish: Napraw pierwszy sprzęt. Rączki się przydadzą!
description.russian: Почини оборудование впервые. Начало положено!
description.schinese: 第一次修好设备，从此走上维修之路。
description.spanish: Repara tu primera máquina. ¡Manos a la obra!
description.swedish: Reparera din första maskin. Dags att bli händig!
description.tchinese: 修好第一件設備，動手能力 GET！
description.turkish: İlk ekipmanını tamir et. Elin yatkın!

description.brazilian: Inicie sua primeira campanha de anúncios. Hora de brilhar!
description.english: Launch your very first in-game ad campaign.
description.french: Lance ta toute première campagne publicitaire. Le business passe à l’offensive !
description.german: Deine erste Ingame-Werbekampagne gestartet – Werbung wirkt!
description.indonesian: Luncurkan kampanye iklan pertamamu. Saatnya dikenal dunia!
description.japanese: 初めての広告キャンペーンを開始。宣伝、大事！
description.koreana: 첫 광고 캠페인 시작. 홍보는 선택이 아니라 필수!
description.polish: Uruchom pierwszą kampanię reklamową. Czas się pokazać!
description.russian: Запусти первую рекламную кампанию. Мир должен знать о тебе!
description.schinese: 开启你的第一场广告宣传，买流量的第一步。
description.spanish: Lanza tu primera campaña publicitaria. ¡Haz ruido!
description.swedish: Starta din första reklamkampanj. Låt alla veta vem du är!
description.tchinese: 開啟第一場廣告活動，開始打品牌囉！
description.turkish: İlk reklam kampanyanı başlat. Artık herkes seni tanıyacak!
